Package nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model

Models how to present the stitches with a pair diagram, thread diagram or descriptive instructions.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Bounds<T extends Segment> Polygon containing the Segments of a Partition, fitting together like jigsaw pieces.
Cross A bobbin going over the next bobbin.
Diagram The root object of the diagram presentation model.
Drawable A 2D shape with painting properties.
DrawableList  
Group Diagram section containing multiple stitches.
Knot A stitch that can not be expressed with a list of simple cross and twist objects.
MultiplePairsPartition Diagram section containing multiple pair segments.
MultipleThreadsPartition Diagram section containing multiple threads segments.
PairSegment A line segment representing a pair of threads.
Partition  
Pin A pin supporting a stitch or pair.
Point  
Range A range of individual bobbins (alias threads) or pairs of bobbins.
Segment A segment of a continuous line.
Stitch  
Style The painting instructions for a line segment.
Switch Two bobbins next to one another change positions.
ThreadSegment A segment of a thread.
ThreadStyle The looks for a line segment drawn in two strokes.
Twist A bobbin going over the previous bobbin.
 

Package nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model Description

Models how to present the stitches with a pair diagram, thread diagram or descriptive instructions.

See object tree as a diagram and the class tree as a diagram
